name: TypeScript
description: Type-safe JavaScript for building scalable, maintainable applications. Used for both frontend and backend systems across projects.
useCases: Designing strongly typed automation SDKs for n8n and Supabase APIs
Building React + Vite frontends with strict type safety

name: Node.js
description: Event-driven JavaScript runtime for server-side applications and developer tooling.
useCases: Building CLI tools for automation and project scaffolding
Integrating OpenAI and Supabase APIs for backend automation
Developing workflow engines and serverless endpoints

name: React
description: Frontend library for building fast, interactive UIs with modular component design.
useCases: Creating dashboards for AI workflow orchestration
Building drag-and-drop editors and real-time data visualizations
Integrating authentication and Supabase state into reactive UIs

name: TailwindCSS
description: Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI prototyping and production-grade design systems.
useCases: Designing responsive, accessible components for dashboards
Creating consistent dark/light themes with shadcn UI
Developing reusable style systems across web apps

name: Supabase
description: Open-source Firebase alternative providing database, auth, and storage via Postgres.
useCases: Managing user authentication and access policies
Syncing workflow logs with real-time database updates
Building analytics dashboards powered by live SQL data

name: Python
description: High-level programming language for AI, data science, and backend automation.
useCases: Serving AI APIs using FastAPI and OpenAI integrations
Processing embeddings and structured data for dashboards
Building automation microservices that complement Node.js layers
